name: myday-guardian
description: Autonomous Behavioral Finance Agent for discipline staking and yield harvesting on Celo L2. Implements x402 HTTP payment protocol for on-chain staking verification.
author: MyDay Finance

x402.flow: Client requests gated resource → Server returns 402 + X-PAYMENT-REQUIRED → Client pays cUSD on Celo L2 → Client retries with X-PAYMENT: <tx_hash> → Server verifies on-chain → 200 OK

telegram.description: Telegram bot — interactive habit coaching with morning nudges and sunset reflections

evm-wallet.description: Agent EVM wallet on Celo L2 Mainnet

tools.description: Returns x402 payment requirements for staking (amount, asset, network, vault address).
